item.title: Rune Evo v3 mypos command
item.dc:creator: @ddl0ver ddl0ver
item.description:
@ddl0ver wrote:

Ok so i’m kinda nooby but i learn stuff fairly well.

So i am trying to add a mypos command to my source. i have the command im just having trouble getting it to work in the file.

these are the errors im getting.
http://gyazo.com/5d3180ac7d12081ad67a3d911a0b0b8a

this is the last commands in the owner.java file

[code] if (cmd[0].equals(“meeting”)) {
for (Player staff : World.getPlayers()) {
if (staff.getRights() == 0 || staff.getRights() > 2)
continue;
staff.setNextWorldTile(player);
staff.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You been teleported for a staff meeting by " + player.getDisplayName());
}
return true;
}

	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) {
			c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX+" Y: "+c.absY+" H: "+c.heightLevel);
		}
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

}[/code]

please explain fairly well so i can learn from this and not just fix the problem.

Thanks

Read full topic
